long_description: A very comfortable pair of pants you can use for weekly yoga class or any fitness activity, the women's MPG Carouse Pants have a boot-cut silhouette and breathable, soft fabric. Organic cotton and spandex fabric offers high breathability and light stretch for excellent comfort during exercise. MPG Carouse Pants for women offer a slim fit around waist and upper legs and relaxed boot-cut around hems. Features a vertical zip side pocket and a rear zippered pocket. Bottom hem with rib-knit tunnel; striped drawcord; tonal embroidered logo.
short_description: A very comfortable pair of pants you can use for weekly yoga class or any fitness activity, the women's MPG Carouse Pants have a boot-cut silhouette and breathable, soft fabric.
